+Prepare dockerfile:

discussion_comments.comment_body:
<!-- metadata:{"confidence":9,"steps":[]} -->
Storing or editing passwords directly in Dockerfiles is insecure and can lead to credential leaks. Use environment variables or Docker secrets for sensitive data.
